property.name: Rules
property.value: {HUNTING} (While battling, this creature gets +1000 power for each of your Hunters in the battle zone.) ■ PLAY'S Psychic Link: At the start of your turn, or whenever you put Gaial Kaiser Play's, if you have Gaial Kaiser Play's, Boost Play's, Crimson Lord and this creature, link them and flip this creature. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

(At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less. ■ Each turn, you may untap this creature the first time it is tapped. ■ While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard. {TRIPLE BREAKER} {RELEASE} - Bolshack Dragon, the Temporal Blaze (When this creature would leave, flip this creature to its lower cost side instead.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less. ■ Each turn, you may untap this creature the first time it is tapped. ■ While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard. {TRIPLE BREAKER} {RELEASE} - Bolshack Dragon, the Temporal Blaze (When this creature would leave, flip this creature to its lower cost side instead.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature, they can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked and blocked.) ■ Awaken—At the end of each turn, if another of your psychic creatures awakened that turn, flip this creature to its higher cost side. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can't be blocked. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, they can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can't be blocked. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, they can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever any of your psychic creatures would be returned to your hand by one of your opponent's spells or the ability of one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone, that creature stays in the battle zone instead. ■ Awaken—At the start of your turn, if you have a creature in the battle zone that has power 6000 or more, flip this creature to its higher cost side. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ If you have 2 shields or less, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put up to 2 Fire psychic creatures that have total cost 8 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into his mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker". ■ Put a Fire psychic creature that costs 9 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put a fire psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Destroy one of your opponent’s creatures that has 3000 power or less. ■ Choose one of the following: ► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone: ► Put a fire psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker" and power 4000 or less. ■ Choose one of the following: ► Put a psychic creature that costs 2 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone: ► Put a Fire or Nature psychic creature that costs 4 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

card.name: Mad Rock Chester Romanov, Purgatory Wicked God

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for the number of cards in each graveyard. It can't cost less than 2. ■ Graveyard Galaxy Vortex evolution: Choose 3 darkness or fire creatures in your graveyard and put this creature on top of those creatures. ■ Meteorburn: Whenever this creature attacks, you may put up to 3 cards under this creature into your graveyard. For each card put into your graveyard in this way, cast a darkness or fire spell that costs 6 or less from your graveyard for no cost and put it on the bottom of your deck. {TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ You can cast this spell only if your opponent has more shields than you do. ■ Your opponent chooses one of his shields for each shield you have. He puts the rest of his shields into his hand. (He can use the "shield trigger" abilities of those shields.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Put a non-evolution darkness or fire creature that costs 7 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. That creature gets "speed attacker" until the end of the turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have a card that has "Romanov" in its name in your graveyard, this creature gets "shield trigger". ■ When you put this creature, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs the same as or less than the number of darkness and fire cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. You may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put a non-evolution creature that costs 7 or less from your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, return a creature from your graveyard to your hand. If that creature is an evolution creature that has the same race as this creature, you may put that creature into the battle zone for no cost.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature wins a battle, destroy it. ■ At the end of each of your turns, if you have a card that has "Romanov" in its name in your graveyard, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. If you don't have a card that has "Romanov" in its name in your graveyard, you may search your deck. If you do, you may take a card that has "Romanov" in its name from among it, put it into your graveyard and shuffle your deck.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ Each turn, whenever you cast a spell for the first time, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Set
